"Photons are an element connected<br>to:
"To put it simply, they're the
essence of the Akashic Record
itself."

"Photons are used as a way for the
Akashic Record to record everything
in the universe."

"When you use it, you channel the
energy that was recorded from
memory and replicate it."

"While the Photoners used Photons
primarily as an energy source,
it could do so much more."

"Now if you were to ask how,
then explaining it might get
a bit difficult."

"Xion likely did not think she could
explain it very well, and only
showed how to use it as energy."

"I somehow comprehend how it works.
I understand Photons more than
most people."

"However, what I can't explain is,
how and why could they be used
differently."

"If I could explain these kinds of
things, perhaps this world would
have been a better place."

"I sometimes wonder if people would
have laughed and smiled..."
